[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

We believe that preventing and ending family homelessness requires a community response. Our partners are a key part of that solution and provide needed resources to make achieving our mission possible.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#8D4881″ custom_padding=”30px||50px||false|false”][et_pb_cta title=”INTERESTED IN PARTNERING WITH US?” button_url=”/contact/” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||”]

We love to work with other corporations and organizations. To learn more about partnership opportunities with Family Promise, please use our contact form.

[/et_pb_cta][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/?subject=partnerships” button_text=”CONTACT US ABOUT BECOMING A PARTNER” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding=”9px|||||” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||1px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

STAR PREMIER PARTNERS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Beiersdorf” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/beiersdorf.jpg” modal_content=”

Family Promise and Beiersdorf have partnered to ensure that families remain healthy, safe, and housed. During the COVID-19 pandemic, the families we serve needed the support of the community more than ever. Beiersdorf’s support ensures we are there whenever families need us.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Belk” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-belk.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”https://familypromise.org/who-we-are/partners/belk/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Clayton” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-clayton.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/clayton/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”IKEA” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-ikea.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”https://familypromise.org/who-we-are/partners/ikea” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”KIA Motors USA” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-kia.jpg” modal_content=”

KIA Motors USA and Family Promise work together as part of KIA’s initiative to provide support for youth experiencing homelessness across the United States.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Progressive” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-progressive.jpg” modal_content=”

Progressive is working with Family Promise to ensure that the families we serve find stable housing where they can feel at home. Through multiple initiatives like Night Without a Bed and Home is Where the Art is, Progressive is ensuring families have successful and happy futures.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Synchrony” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-synchrony.jpg” modal_content=”

Synchrony has partnered with Family Promise to launch a new $1.2 million shelter diversion initiative aimed to help families combat homelessness. Shelter diversion helps end homelessness by prioritizing housing-based intervention, preserving community resources for those who need it most, and preventing the stress and trauma of shelter where other options exist.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”TJX” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-tjk.jpg” modal_content=”

TJX has supported a variety of Family Promise initiatives, including as a key fundraising partner for our COVID-19 Pandemic Relief efforts,which included helping to ensure that Family Promise Affiliates across the United States had what they needed to provide safe shelter, prevention, and stabilization services to low-income families and children.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Woodforest National Bank” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-woodforest.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/woodforest-national-bank/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”partners-other” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||1px|||” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

CORPORATE PARTNERS

CORPORATE SUPPORTERS

NONPROFIT PARTNERS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Imagine: A Center for Coping with Loss” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-imagine.jpg” modal_content=”Homelessness brings a profound sense of loss and, with it, comes trauma and grief. Recognizing that, our Union County program partnered with Imagine, A Center for Coping with Loss, to develop a “Living With Loss: Healing From Homelessness” workshop to help guests work through that trauma and train volunteers to facilitate the process. The curriculum promotes empathetic learning about the trauma we all experience throughout our journeys, which can lead us to deeper human connections.

The innovative workshop was profiled in the New York Times.

The partnership is now being rolled out to Affiliates and their communities nationwide.” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Help Us Move In” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-humi.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/help-us-move-in/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”The National Center for Missing & Exploited Children” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-ncm.jpg” modal_content=”

The mission of the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children is to help find missing children, reduce child sexual exploitation, and prevent child victimization. Since 1984, NCMEC has served as the national clearinghouse and resource center for families, victims, private organizations, law enforcement and the public on issues relating to missing and sexually exploited children.

Family Promise is proud to partner with NCMEC to provide families experiencing homelessness and the professionals who serve them with information and access to reporting mechanisms, training to help identify missing and/or exploited children, and prevention education resources. This includes:

  • Training for Family Promise employees and volunteers to ensure they have access to information and are able to identify missing and/or exploited children who may be in their care;
  • Access to the NCMEC registry for intake;
  • Co-branded child IDs for distribution to families;
  • Select child safety resources to Family Promise for distribution to employees.

” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”PetSmart Charities” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-petsmart.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/petsmart-charities/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Sesame Street in Communities” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-sesame.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/sesame-street-in-communities/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”The Worldwide ERC Foundation for Workforce Mobility” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-fwm.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”https://www.worldwideerc.org/foundation” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”partners-other” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_margin=”||30px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_6,1_6,1_6,1_6,1_6,1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”HomeAid” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-homeaid.jpg” modal_content=”

HomeAid is a leading national nonprofit provider of housing for families and individuals experiencing homelessness. Through their 17 chapters in 12 states, HomeAid has completed more than 450 housing projects at a value of more than $210 million. More than 250,000 people have been provided shelter over the past 27 years.

Family Promise and HomeAid share a mission of transforming the lives of families experiencing homelessness through community outreach. Our partnership allows Family Promise Affiliates nationwide to be considered for HomeAid building projects in communities where the two organizations share a presence as well as create opportunities to explore expansion in new markets. It gives our Affiliates a greater ability to connect with local builders to create housing solutions for their families.

Family Promise and HomeAid have worked together on projects in markets nationwide. Current and future projects include new and renovated Day Centers, transitional and permanent housing facilities, and joint efforts to raise funds and procure materials.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”NABC Recycled Rides” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-nabc.jpg” modal_content=”

NABC Recycled Rides™ is a nationwide community service project of the National Auto Body Council in which insurers, collision repairers, paint suppliers, and others collaborate to repair and donate vehicles to Family Promise guest families and Affiliates, as well as other deserving service organizations.

In the Recycled Rides program, insurance companies donate the vehicles, parts, and paint, manufacturers donate the materials, and local auto body shops donate the labor. By facilitating connections between auto body shops and our Affiliates, Family Promise will help ensure that vehicles go to deserving families.

This organization has been an incredible partner for Affiliates, providing nearly 250 vehicles over the past few years for families in our programs.

” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”New Jersey Pandemic Relief Fund” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-prf.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”https://njprf.org/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Prosperity Now” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-prosperitynow.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/prosperity-now/” link_option_url_new_window=”on”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_fp_person name=”Schoolhouse Connection” image_url=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/partner-shc.jpg” modal_content=”

SchoolHouse Connection (SHC) is a national organization promoting success for children and youth experiencing homelessness, from birth through higher education. SHC engages in strategic advocacy and provides technical assistance in partnership with early care and education professionals (including school district homeless liaisons and state coordinators), young people, service providers, advocates, and local communities.

SchoolHouse Connection helps Affiliates connect with school McKinney-Vento liaisons, advises on federal and state policy affecting homeless children, and provides scholarships and leadership opportunities for youth.

They are an Affiliate resource for:

  • Questions about the law (compliance, policy, practice) regarding early childhood, pre-K and higher education;
  • Assistance in connecting to local school districts and state departments of education;
  • Reporting on challenges and successes with local policy implementation of federal laws and funding.

” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_fp_person][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: We believe that preventing and ending family homelessness requires a community response. Our partners are a key part of that solution and provide needed resources to make achieving our mission […]
